name: AplusA Research
overview:
As your full-service primary market research partner, we will provide you with strategic insights and recommendations, not just data. With 23 years of experience collaborating exclusively with healthcare manufacturers, we have the scientific and methodological knowledge & experience to design, execute & manage studies that accurately answer your pressing business questions. Contact us to develop a strategic partnership with our highly experienced and emphatic project leaders.

What makes partnering with AplusA Research for market research projects a unique and successful experience?  Emphatic project leaders and teams who will accurately, effectively, and concisely answer your business question(s)  Unique expertise in KPI trackers to follow up your product performance and choice modeling techniques to select the most impactful and profitable strategy  Market research teams that master the methodology, techniques and always ensure representative samples with accurate analytics to deliver powerful insights  Unique expertise in emerging countries based on 23 years of experience conducting global studies in most markets  Dedication to collaborating solely with healthcare manufacturers but always innovating and learning from best practices of other industries such as consumer goods, technology and banking.
